item.description:
Axiatonal Light Grid:  Medical Astronomy

Presented by Aimee Carruth

 

Cosmic information is in your "bar code," seen and known as your DNA.  Aimee Carruth presents a system using twelve stargates that are the "houses" of Light information. setting a web of light for us all.  Carruth notes, "These communicating lines" of Light are the constant vibrating foundation from which Consciousness shapes physical reality."  Light information is constantly being sent.  Are you receiving all of what is being sent?  Aimee will help you understand this powerful system of energy medicine.

 

Aimee Carruth has been working with and teaching the Axiatonal Light Grid system for over 20 years.  She is an author, speaker, medical intuitive and has worked with clients ranging from the United Nations International Spiritual leaders and indigo children to near death experience survivors.  She is considered a wisdom keeper by the Seventh Sage community.  Aimee now lives in Central MA to be close to her family and new granddaughter.

www.enlighten.org and www.LoveRising.info

 

The meeting begins with a potluck lunch at 11:30 am.  Presentation is from 12:15 - 1:15 pm.

 

$10 meetup fee.
item.name: January Boston Area Mind-Body Therapies Meetup: Axiatonal Light Grid
